name: pentecost
description: This consist of the client and server codes, nothing to say for now..

scripts.build: cd ./client && npm i && cd .. && cd ./server && npm i && cd .. && cd ./client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./server/pentecost-voice.json && NODE_ENV=production node app.js
